column3: the only art I saw were the paintings in the modern wing. Fortunately
column4: that is the best part of the place
column5: or at least it was enough to kill a few hours. I got to see some amazing pieces that I'd only seen before in books
column6: and that was kind of awesome. Highlights include: "American Gothic" and "Nighthawks" as well as most of Georgia O'Keeffe's work.
